div1.p: Lyons requests information on Camp Lazear Building No. 1 for the Hall of Fame exhibit on Reed.

div1.head: Telegram from Bertha L. Lyons to Philip Showalter Hench, April 29, 1948

1948 APR 29 PM 2 24 DOCTOR PHYLLIS HENCH= MAYO CLINIC ROCHESTER MINN=
div1.p:
FOR PURPOSES OF CAPTIONS IN PROGRAM HOW DOES REMAINS OF
BUILDING NUMBER ONE DIFFER FROM OTHER BUILDINGS AT CAMP LAZEAR
SHOWN IN ARMY MEDICAL NEGATIVE 40732 WERE ORIGINAL EXPERIMENTS
DISPROVING FOMITE THEORY CARRIED ON IN REMAINS OF BUILDING
NUMBER ONE. PLEASE SUGGEST SUITABLE CAPTION FOR REMAINS OF
BUILDING NUMBER ONE AND WIRE COLLECT=
div1.closer:
BERTHA L LYONS. .40732 FOMITE.
COMPANY WILL APPRECIATE SUGGESTIONS FROM ITS PATRONS CONCERNING ITS SERVICE
